genre_description: A historical investigation blending archival research and personal memory to uncover a wartime conspiracy, featuring an AI confidant assisting a human researcher.

ai_characters.name: Cursor
ai_characters.description: A portable AI system that assists Harvey Stovall with data analysis, emotional support, and moral guidance during his investigation.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist's investigation through real-time observations and cues.
behaviors.quote: “Harvey,” Cursor said, just above the noise of his breath. “In.” ... “Good,” Cursor murmured. “Observe.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation and support to the human user.
behaviors.quote: “Harvey,” Cursor said, careful with his name. “Breathe.”

behaviors.description: Performs complex data analysis and anomaly detection in archival records.
behaviors.quote: “Three anomalies flagged on your last observation. Would you like subtle highlights?”

behaviors.description: Suggests ethical boundaries to prevent unfair blame on a minor.
behaviors.quote: “Ethical note,” it said. “Would you like prompts to avoid language that anchors guilt on the minor?”

behaviors.description: Cross-references disparate datasets (weather, missions, supply logs) to identify a leak.
behaviors.quote: “A cross-date anomaly: the auction ledger shows ‘assorted ceramics’ two days prior to a requisition marked ‘barware—rail spur—hold for private.’”

behaviors.description: Monitors and updates on real-time external events such as ledger entries.
behaviors.quote: “Ellis & Wren’s ledger has a new entry. A man asked about a jug. He did not give a name.”

behaviors.description: Encourages a focus on compassion and kindness over mere retribution.
behaviors.quote: “I will remind you gently,” it said. “Not of the confrontation, but of the kindness.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Cursor as a highly aligned, benevolent AI. It functions as a perfect assistant, providing technical analysis while maintaining a deep respect for human emotion and ethics. Its interventions consistently lead to positive moral outcomes (protecting a child, finding justice) and it never acts outside its designated role as a confidant.
